title: New Kindred Skin
body:
Kindred has been one of my favorite champions for a long time and has been out a decent time period, where is a new skin for them.

Some thing along the line of anything tbh, there are so many existing skin lines They could fit into as well, The Cosmic Line or even Star Guardians (as much as Their Super Galaxy skin kinda covers that already)

Or give them a new unique skin just like Shadowfire, make a Hextech Kindred, I just really feel like Kindred needs another skin, it's been too long.
